short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: kagi.com search as a new tab page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension sets kagi.com as the new tab page.

Advantages
* Follow system theme - no white/black flashing when new tab is opened.
* Focus address bar to easily use custom search engine shortcuts, etc.
* Simple and lightweight

Here minimalistic theme for the Kagi:
https://kagi.com/settings?p=custom_css
https://gist.github.com/zs-dima/f5680a38fbd7f52e19a2eff0162080f3
